name: Prnp phylogenetic data
description: Contains alignment and reduced matrix to accompany the manuscript "Predicting the spread-risk potential of chronic wasting disease to sympatric ungulate species" in Prion

citation.text: Cullingham CI, Peery RM, Dao A, McKenzie DI, Coltman DW. Predicting the spread-risk potential of chronic wasting disease to sympatric ungulate species. Prion

distribution.name: 23refSeq_cytb.phy
distribution.description: Sequence alignment file for cytochrome b

distribution.name: AccessionTable_cytB.tab
distribution.description: Supplementary table of the accession details for the cytochrome b sequences used to develop the phylogeny

distribution.name: PrnpAlignment_full.txt
distribution.description: Prnp sequence alignment across species - data are in tabular format

distribution.name: PrnpAlignment_reduced.txt
distribution.description: Reduced Prnp alignment used to assess differences between CWD susceptible and resistant species - data are in tabular format
